Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 55 rooms. Room service is among the facilities. Wireless internet access is available to guests. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms The feelgood factor in the comfortable accommodation units is heightened by a range of amenities at the establishment. Features of the rooms include WiFi. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers travellers a range of leisure and recreation facilities, including a gym (for a fee). Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
